description.value:
This tiny cylinder contains specialized nanites that either

  • Remove the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fatigued] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Paralyzed] condition
  • Decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Sickened] condition by 1.
  • Attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target. Use your @Check[medicine] modifier for the counteract modifier and a counteract rank of 6.
  • Attempt a flat check to end persistent poison or bleed damage. As this is particularly effective assistance, the DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 10 for this check.

  • Allow you to become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Quickened] for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

    @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Hypopen (Quickened or Fast Healing)]{Effect: Hypopen (Quickened)}
